name: Just Tester
description:
What happens when the paths behind you disappear once you take them and not even the walls can save you from the monster lurking?

Just tester is a visual novel presenting the escapist-idea of a classic video-game world but at another light. A darker light. Struggling with amnesia and being hunted by a monster lurking in the shadows, Will you discover what happened and how your state came to be or will you quit when you realize that death is infinite...
